name: A Game of Dwarves: Star Dwarves
name_original: A Game of Dwarves: Star Dwarves
description:
A Game of Dwarves: Star Dwarves is a strategy game developed by Zeal Game Studios. It was originally released in 2012. Paradox Interactive published the game.
You can play A Game of Dwarves: Star Dwarves on PC.
